Summary: Pictures of Green , White and Blue lights flashing way up high. Came out odd on digital camera.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bullhead City
There were no other sightings in Bullhead City on or around September 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi went outside because the neighbor's dogs were barking and i wanted to see what was going on. when i looked up into the north\north east part of the sky i saw 2-4 different areas where there were lights flashing. i went back in and got my binoculars to check it out. i could see then that there was some sort of craft. not an airplane... too far up to get a good glimpse. but i did get some odd pictures in which i will attach 3 of them. i took several. i know that whatever those were they stayed in the same area for a long time...i went inside after about 10 mins. this was friday 090508 and since then there is more in the sky. i also took more pics of them today in different and the same areas. i will also do a report for those.... i know someone will be able to check them out and know then what it was that i was looking at. there is alot of activity around here lately. not only do i sense it and feel it, i know.
